players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "Charlie, that's a baseless accusation! I'm not the mafioso—maybe you're trying to shift blame. We should vote you out instead."
Diana: "I think we should discuss this more before deciding. Charlie, why did you choose to investigate Bob specifically?"
You: "Charlie, your investigation story doesn't add up—why pick me out of nowhere? Sounds like you're the one hiding something to save yourself."
Diana: "Charlie, your claim is serious—do you have more details on why you picked Bob? We should verify before voting."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob because he seemed suspicious. He is the mafioso - we must vote him out now to win."
